title: Episode 158 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page for Episode 158 containing episode details, plot summary, air dates, production credits, and character information.

title: Chapter 244 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Wiki page for manga Chapter 244 titled 'SOS' which serves as the source material for Episode 158. Contains plot summary and chapter details.

title: 158: 'A Trap on Lovely Street! The Almighty God Eneru' - Never Watched One Piece
author: neverwatchedonepiece
description: First-time viewer's analysis of Episode 158, discussing Conis's moral dilemma, Enel's abilities, and the episode's revelations about Skypiea's society.

title: How Skypiea Became One Piece's Most Underappreciated Arc
author: CBR Staff
description: Analysis article arguing that the Skypiea Arc's unique narrative continues to age like fine wine and has a legitimate claim as the most underrated arc in One Piece.

title: One Underrated One Piece Arc Is Key To Understanding Why The Series Is So Beloved
author: Screen Rant Staff
description: Article analyzing why Skypiea is essential to understanding One Piece's appeal, stating 'the good heavily outweighs the bad, and it is criminal how underrated it is.'

title: How the Most Skipped Arc In One Piece Is Secretly the Most Essential to the Story
author: CBR Staff
description: Recent article discussing how Skypiea laid the foundation for One Piece's overarching narrative and worldbuilding, with connections to the current storyline.

title: One Piece's Biggest Cliffhanger Yet Makes the Skypiea Arc More Important Than Ever
author: Screen Rant Staff
description: Analysis of how recent manga chapters connect back to the Skypiea arc, demonstrating Oda's long-term planning and the arc's importance to the overall story.

title: Enel - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive character page for Enel covering his abilities, history, Devil Fruit powers, and role in the Skypiea arc.

title: Goro Goro no Mi - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Detailed page about Enel's Goro Goro no Mi (Rumble-Rumble Fruit), covering its abilities, techniques like El Thor, and its status as one of the most powerful Devil Fruits.

title: Observation Haki/Mantra - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive page about Observation Haki (known as Mantra in Skypiea), explaining its mechanics, users, and how it was first introduced in the series.

title: Conis - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Character page for Conis covering her role in the Skypiea arc, her relationship with the Straw Hats, and her courageous decision to defy Enel.

title: Gan Fall - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Character page for Gan Fall, the former God of Skypiea, covering his history, abilities, and role as protector and ally to the Straw Hats.

title: Skypiea - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Comprehensive location page for Skypiea covering its geography, history, culture, political structure, and significance in the One Piece world.

title: Hikari e (Opening 3) - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Information page about the third One Piece opening song 'Hikari e' performed by The Babystars, used for episodes 116-168.

title: FAITH (Ending 10) - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki contributors
description: Information page about the tenth One Piece ending song 'FAITH' performed by Ruppina, used for episodes 157-168.
